nio/Stock.description: Returns some stock quotes, along with other information, from [Yahoo Finance](https://finance.yahoo.com/).

include_query.title: Include Query Field
include_query.description: Whether to include queries in request to Yahoo Stocks.

polling_interval.title: Polling Interval
polling_interval.description: How often Yahoo Stocks is polled. When using more than one query. Each query will be polled at a period equal to the *polling interval* times the number of queries.

queries.title: Symbols/Tickers
queries.description: Queries to include on request to Yahoo Stocks.

retry_interval.title: Retry Interval
retry_interval.description: When a url request fails, how long to wait before attempting to try again.

retry_limit.title: Retry Limit
retry_limit.description: Number of times to retry on a poll.

default.description: A list of signals, one per ticker.
